text.__SUMMARY__:
Quercus ningangensis is an Asian species of trees in the beech family. It is native to southern China (Guangxi, Hunan, Jiangxi).
Quercus ningangensis is a large tree up to 30 meters tall. Leaves can be as much as 18 cm long.
text.External links: line drawing, Flora of China Illustrations vol. 4, fig. 379, drawings 8-13 at top
